Articles.Content:
I constantly crash to desktop with write crashes. I'm already using ATM and running in OpenGL.

[https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ani5gg18yvvixs0/AAA6fuI0MpClpwP6JuD8AXKEa?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ani5gg18yvvixs0/AAA6fuI0MpClpwP6JuD8AXKEa?dl=0)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-20T18:44:12Z" title="02/20/2015 06:44  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 20, 2015</time> by handsmahoney**
Hey no offense but next time can you upload this file to drop box and share a link?

> 
> 0 MB user address space [102 MB free].

Looks like that you're running out of memory. 

With its "load all at once" system and all of its memory leaks (both stock and mod), KSP will eventually crash. No exceptions. OpenGL and ATM just postpone the inevitable.
And when you share that dropbox link include the others logs too.
Try decreaseing the resolution to half res or quater res. Should help.
